mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS ( ID, CREDIT_HEAD_ID,
CREADE_CODE,
UNIT_NAME, CHECK_PEOPLE,
CHECK_DATE, REVIEW_PEOPLE,
REVIEW_DATE,
INDEX_CODE, BELONG_DATE,
MAIN_INCOME,
MAIN_COST, MAIN_TAXES, MAIN_PROFIT,
MAIN_OTHER_PROFIT,
MAIN_OPER_COST,
MAIN_MAN_FEE,
MAIN_FINNA_FEE,
OPER_PROFIT,
INVESTMENT_PROFIT,
SUBSIDY_INCOME,
OPER_INCOME,
OPER_EXPENDITURE,
PROFIT_TOTAL,
INCOME_TAX, PROFIT_NET,
NOT_ASSIGNED_PROFIT, OTHER_TRANSFER,
DISTRIBUTION_PROFIT,
STATU_SURPLUS_RESERVE, STATU_SURPLUS_FUND,
BONUS_WELFARE_FUND,
RESERVE_FUND,
DEVELOPMENT_FUND,
PROFIT_RETURN_INVESTMENT, INVESTOR_PROFIT,
PAININ_DIVIDEND,
EXTRACTION_SURPLUS_RESERVE,
PAIDIN_ORDINARY_FUND, CAPITAL_FUND,
UNDISTR_PROFIT,
UNDIST_PROFIT_DIFF,
SURPLUS_RESERVE_RATE, WELFARE_FUND_RATE,
INCOME_TAX_RATE,
INTEREST_EXPENSES,
LONG_TERM_DEBT_BURDEN,
CURRENT_DEBT_BURDEN, NET_SALES, IN_DATE, KGFPLR_A, KGFPLR_B, PEOPLE_ID, ISAUDIT, IDENTIFIERS, HY_ID, TYPE, CREADE_DATE, STATE ) VALUES( SEQ_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS.NEXTVAL, #{CREDIT_HEAD_ID},
#{CREADE_CODE},
#{UNIT_NAME}, #{CHECK_PEOPLE},
to_date(#{CHECK_DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
#{REVIEW_PEOPLE},
to_date(#{REVIEW_DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
#{INDEX_CODE},
#{BELONG_DATE},
#{MAIN_INCOME},
#{MAIN_COST}, #{MAIN_TAXES},
#{MAIN_PROFIT},
#{MAIN_OTHER_PROFIT},
#{MAIN_OPER_COST},
#{MAIN_MAN_FEE},
#{MAIN_FINNA_FEE},
#{OPER_PROFIT},
#{INVESTMENT_PROFIT},
#{SUBSIDY_INCOME},
#{OPER_INCOME},
#{OPER_EXPENDITURE},
#{PROFIT_TOTAL},
#{INCOME_TAX},
#{PROFIT_NET},
#{NOT_ASSIGNED_PROFIT}, #{OTHER_TRANSFER},
#{DISTRIBUTION_PROFIT},
#{STATU_SURPLUS_RESERVE}, #{STATU_SURPLUS_FUND},
#{BONUS_WELFARE_FUND},
#{RESERVE_FUND},
#{DEVELOPMENT_FUND},
#{PROFIT_RETURN_INVESTMENT}, #{INVESTOR_PROFIT},
#{PAININ_DIVIDEND},
#{EXTRACTION_SURPLUS_RESERVE},
#{PAIDIN_ORDINARY_FUND}, #{CAPITAL_FUND},
#{UNDISTR_PROFIT},
#{UNDIST_PROFIT_DIFF},
#{SURPLUS_RESERVE_RATE}, #{WELFARE_FUND_RATE},
#{INCOME_TAX_RATE},
#{INTEREST_EXPENSES},
#{LONG_TERM_DEBT_BURDEN},
#{CURRENT_DEBT_BURDEN}, #{NET_SALES}, #{IN_DATE}, #{KGFPLR_A}, #{KGFPLR_B}, #{PEOPLE_ID}, #{ISAUDIT}, #{MANAGEID}, #{INDUSTRY_ID}, 0, sysdate, 0 )

INSERT INTO FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH ( ID,
PROVIDE_SERVICE_CASH, TAX_RETURN, OTHER_OPERATE,
OPERATE_INTO_TOTAL,
PROVIDE_PAYMENT_CASH, PAYMENT_STAFF_CASH,
PAY_ITEM_TAX,
PAY_PROVIDE_CASH,
OPERATE_OUT_TOTAL,
OPERATE_NET,
INVEST_CASH,
INVEST_INCOME,
ASSETS_CASH,
OTHER_INVEST,
INVEST_INTO,
ASSET_PAY, INVEST_PAY, OTHER_INVEST_PAY,
INVEST_OUT, INVEST_NET, ABSORB_INVEST,
LOAN, OTHER_PREPARE_IN,
PREPARE_INCOM_TOTAL, DEBT_PAY, INTEREST_PAY,
OTHER_PREPARE_PAY,
PREPARE_OUT_TOTAL,
PREPARE_NET,
CHANGE_RATE,
CASH_NET, NET, ASSET_REDUCE,
FIXED_DEP, INVISIBLE_DEP,
PREPAID_FEE,
PREPAID_REDUCE,
HOLD_ADD, ASSET_LOSS, FIXED_LOSS, FINANCE_FEE,
INVEST_LOSS,
DEFERR, STOCK_REDUCE,
OPERATE_INCOME,
OPERATE_PAY,
OTHE, OPERATE_NET_D,
DEBT_TO_CAPITAL,
YEAR_BOND, FINANCE, END_BALANCE,
BEGIN_BALANCE,
THING_END_BALANCE,
THING_BEGIN_BALANCE, CASH_INCREASE,
A_COMPARE_D,
B_COMPARE_G,
C_COMPARE_PROFIT,
E_COMPARE_BEGIN,
E_COMPARE_END,
F_COMPARE_BEGIN,
B_COMPARE_DEFFERENCE, UNKNOWN_ONE,
UNKNOWN_TWO,
UNKNOWN_THREE,
UNKNOWN_FOUR,
UNKNOWN_FIVE,
UNKNOWN_SIX,
UNKNOWN_SEVEN,
UNKNOWN_EIGHT,
IN_DATE, UNIT_NAME, CHECK_PEOPLE,
CHECK_DATE, REVIEW_PEOPLE,
REVIEW_DATE,
INDEX_CODE, BELONG_DATE,
CREDIT_HEAD_ID,
CREATE_CODE,
CASH_VALUE, CASH_HOUJIA_VAVLE,
NMLDFZ, QMLDFZ, ISAUDIT, PEOPLE_ID, BEGINNING_CASH_EQUIVALENTS, FINAL_CASH_EQUIVALENTS, INCOME_TAX, IDENTIFIERS, HY_ID, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH.NEXTVAL,
#{PROVIDE_SERVICE_CASH}, #{TAX_RETURN},
#{OTHER_OPERATE},
#{OPERATE_INTO_TOTAL},
#{PROVIDE_PAYMENT_CASH}, #{PAYMENT_STAFF_CASH},
#{PAY_ITEM_TAX},
#{PAY_PROVIDE_CASH},
#{OPERATE_OUT_TOTAL},
#{OPERATE_NET},
#{INVEST_CASH},
#{INVEST_INCOME},
#{ASSETS_CASH},
#{OTHER_INVEST},
#{INVEST_INTO},
#{ASSET_PAY}, #{INVEST_PAY},
#{OTHER_INVEST_PAY},
#{INVEST_OUT},
#{INVEST_NET},
#{ABSORB_INVEST},
#{LOAN}, #{OTHER_PREPARE_IN},
#{PREPARE_INCOM_TOTAL}, #{DEBT_PAY}, #{INTEREST_PAY},
#{OTHER_PREPARE_PAY},
#{PREPARE_OUT_TOTAL},
#{PREPARE_NET},
#{CHANGE_RATE},
#{CASH_NET}, #{NET}, #{ASSET_REDUCE},
#{FIXED_DEP}, #{INVISIBLE_DEP},
#{PREPAID_FEE},
#{PREPAID_REDUCE},
#{HOLD_ADD}, #{ASSET_LOSS},
#{FIXED_LOSS},
#{FINANCE_FEE},
#{INVEST_LOSS},
#{DEFERR}, #{STOCK_REDUCE},
#{OPERATE_INCOME},
#{OPERATE_PAY},
#{OTHE}, #{OPERATE_NET_D},
#{DEBT_TO_CAPITAL},
#{YEAR_BOND}, #{FINANCE}, #{END_BALANCE},
#{BEGIN_BALANCE},
#{THING_END_BALANCE},
#{THING_BEGIN_BALANCE}, #{CASH_INCREASE},
#{A_COMPARE_D},
#{B_COMPARE_G},
#{C_COMPARE_PROFIT},
#{E_COMPARE_BEGIN},
#{E_COMPARE_END},
#{F_COMPARE_BEGIN},
#{B_COMPARE_DEFFERENCE}, #{UNKNOWN_ONE},
#{UNKNOWN_TWO},
#{UNKNOWN_THREE},
#{UNKNOWN_FOUR},
#{UNKNOWN_FIVE},
#{UNKNOWN_SIX},
#{UNKNOWN_SEVEN},
#{UNKNOWN_EIGHT},
#{IN_DATE}, #{UNIT_NAME}, #{CHECK_PEOPLE},
to_date(#{CHECK_DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
#{REVIEW_PEOPLE},
to_date(#{REVIEW_DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd'),
#{INDEX_CODE},
#{BELONG_DATE},
#{CREDIT_HEAD_ID},
#{CREATE_CODE},
#{CASH_VALUE},
#{CASH_HOUJIA_VAVLE},
#{NMLDFZ}, #{QMLDFZ}, #{ISAUDIT}, #{CLIENT_ID}, #{BEGINNING_CASH_EQUIVALENTS}, #{FINAL_CASH_EQUIVALENTS}, #{INCOME_TAX}, #{MANAGEID}, #{INDUSTRY_ID}, sysdate, #{CREATE_NAME} )

INSERT INTO FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_ANALYZE( ID, ANALYZE_DATE, SELL_GROSS_PROFIT, SELL_NET_PROFIT, ACCET_RATE_OF_RETURN, FLOW_RATE, QUICK_FREEZE_RATE, ASSET_LIABILITIES_RATE, LEVER_RATE, SELL_INCOME_INCREASE, ASSET_INCOME_INCREASE, YSZKZE_DAYS, CHZHZH_DAYS, TOTAL_ASSET_DAYS, CASH_FLOW_DEBT, XJFZZE_RATE, SELL_CASH_RATE, YYXJHL_RATE, EBITDA, CLIENT_ID, UNIT_NAME, CHECK_PEOPLE, CHECK_DATE, REVIEW_PEOPLE, REVIEW_DATE, INDEX_CODE, BELONG_DATE, IDENTIFIERS, HY_ID, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID )VALUES( SEQ_INDUSTRY_analyze.NEXTVAL, #{ANALYZE_DATE}, #{SELL_GROSS_PROFIT}, #{SELL_NET_PROFIT}, #{ACCET_RATE_OF_RETURN}, #{FLOW_RATE}, #{QUICK_FREEZE_RATE}, #{ASSET_LIABILITIES_RATE}, #{LEVER_RATE}, #{SELL_INCOME_INCREASE}, #{ASSET_INCOME_INCREASE}, #{YSZKZE_DAYS}, #{CHZHZH_DAYS}, #{TOTAL_ASSET_DAYS}, #{CASH_FLOW_DEBT}, #{XJFZZE_RATE}, #{SELL_CASH_RATE}, #{YYXJHL_RATE}, #{EBITDA}, #{CLIENT_ID}, #{UNIT_NAME}, #{CHECK_PEOPLE}, #{CHECK_DATE}, #{REVIEW_PEOPLE}, #{REVIEW_DATE}, #{INDEX_CODE}, #{BELONG_DATE}, #{MANAGEID}, #{INDUSTRY_ID}, sysdate, #{CREATE_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN MAIN_INCOME!=0 THEN ROUND(NVL((((MAIN_INCOME - MAIN_COST) / MAIN_INCOME) * 100),0),2) ELSE 0 END MAIN_BUSINESS, --销售毛利率 CASE WHEN MAIN_INCOME!=0 THEN ROUND(NVL(((PROFIT_NET/MAIN_INCOME)*100),0),2) ELSE 0 END JING_RATE, --销售净利率 CASE WHEN NET_TOTAL!=0 THEN ROUND(NVL(((PROFIT_NET/NET_TOTAL)*100),0),2) ELSE 0 END JINGLIRUN--净利润 FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS S LEFT JOIN FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT D ON S.HY_ID =D.HY_ID WHERE S.IN_DATE IN (#{IN_DATE},#{IN_DATE1},#{IN_DATE2}) AND S.PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND S.HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY S.ID DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN FLOW_DABT_TOTAL!=0 THEN ROUND((FLOW_ASSETS_TOTAL / FLOW_DABT_TOTAL),2) ELSE 0 END FLOW_RATE,--流动比率 CASE WHEN FLOW_DABT_TOTAL!=0 THEN ROUND(((FLOW_ASSETS_TOTAL - STOCK)/FLOW_DABT_TOTAL),2) ELSE 0 END QUICK_FREEZE_RATE, --速冻比率 CASE WHEN NET_TOTAL!=0 THEN ROUND(((DABT_TOTAL/NET_TOTAL)*100),2) ELSE 0 END ZCFZ_RATE, --资产负债率 CASE WHEN OWER_TOTAL!=0 THEN ROUND(((NET_TOTAL/OWER_TOTAL)*100),2) ELSE 0 END GANGGAN_RATE, --杠杆率 NET_TOTAL FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT WHERE IN_DATE IN (#{IN_DATE},#{IN_DATE1},#{IN_DATE2}) AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT ROUND((NVL(NET, 0) + NVL(FIXED_DEP, 0) + NVL(INVISIBLE_DEP, 0) + NVL(PREPAID_FEE, 0) + NVL(CASH_PAYMENTS, 0) + NVL(INCOME_TAX, 0)), 2) EBITDA FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH
PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} AND IN_DATE in (#{IN_DATE},#{IN_DATE1},#{IN_DATE2}) AND ROWNUM <= 3
ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT case C.NMLDFZ when '0' then 0 else ROUND(NVL(((C.OPERATE_NET / C.NMLDFZ) * 100), 0), 2) end XJ_LD_FZ_RATE, --现金流动负债率 case C.QMLDFZ when '0' then 0 else ROUND(NVL(((C.OPERATE_NET / C.QMLDFZ) * 100), 0), 2) end XJ_ZW_ZE_RATE, --现金债务总额比率 case P.NET_SALES when '0' then 0 else ROUND(NVL(((C.OPERATE_NET / P.NET_SALES) * 100), 0), 2)end XSH_XJ_RATE, --销售现金比率 case P.NET_SALES when '0' then 0 else ROUND(NVL(((C.PROVIDE_SERVICE_CASH / P.NET_SALES) * 100), 0), 2)end YY_XJ_HL_RATE --营业现金回笼率 FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH C, FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS P WHERE C.PEOPLE_ID = P.PEOPLE_ID(+) AND C.IN_DATE IN (#{IN_DATE},#{IN_DATE1},#{IN_DATE2}) AND C.PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND C.HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID}

SELECT MAIN_INCOME, IN_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM') IN_DATE_YUE FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS WHERE IN_DATE IN (#{IN_DATE},#{IN_DATE1},#{IN_DATE2}) AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY ID ASC

SELECT NET_TOTAL , IN_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM') IN_DATE_YUE FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT WHERE IN_DATE IN (#{IN_DATE},#{IN_DATE1},#{IN_DATE2}) AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY ID ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN T1.MAIN_INCOME != 0 AND T2.ACCOUNTS_SECTION1 != 0 THEN (((T1.ACCOUNTS_SECTION + T2.ACCOUNTS_SECTION1) / 2) * 360) / T1.MAIN_INCOME WHEN T1.MAIN_INCOME != 0 AND T2.ACCOUNTS_SECTION1 = 0 THEN (((T1.ACCOUNTS_SECTION + T1.ACCOUNTS_SECTION) / 2) * 360) / T1.MAIN_INCOME ELSE 0 END YS_ZK_TSH, Nvl((CASE WHEN T1.MAIN_INCOME != 0 THEN (((T1.STOCK + T2.STOCK) / 2) * 360) / T1.MAIN_INCOME ELSE 0 END), 0) CH_ZK_TSH, Nvl((CASE WHEN T1.MAIN_INCOME != 0 AND T2.NET_TOTAL != 0 THEN (((T1.NET_TOTAL + T2.NET_TOTAL) / 2) * 360) / T1.MAIN_INCOME WHEN T1.MAIN_INCOME != 0 AND T2.NET_TOTAL = 0 THEN (((T1.NET_TOTAL + T1.NET_TOTAL) / 2) * 360) / T1.MAIN_INCOME ELSE 0 END), 0) ZZC_ZK_TSH FROM (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ACCOUNTS_SECTION) ACCOUNTS_SECTION, TO_NUMBER(STOCK) STOCK, TO_NUMBER(NET_TOTAL) NET_TOTAL, d.PEOPLE_ID, -- NVL(TO_NUMBER(SALES_REVENUE), 0) SALES_REVENUE, P.MAIN_INCOME FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT D LEFT JOIN FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS P ON D.PEOPLE_ID = P.PEOPLE_ID WHERE D.IN_DATE IN (#{IN_DATE},#{IN_DATE1},#{IN_DATE2}) AND d.PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND d.HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID}) T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(ACCOUNTS_SECTION) ACCOUNTS_SECTION1, TO_NUMBER(STOCK) STOCK, TO_NUMBER(NET_TOTAL) NET_TOTAL, PEOPLE_ID FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT WHERE IN_DATE IN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{IN_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{IN_DATE1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{IN_DATE2}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CLIENT_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID}) T2 ON T1.PEOPLE_ID = T2.PEOPLE_ID

SELECT A.ID, A.CLIENT_ID, A.ANALYZE_DATE, A.SELL_GROSS_PROFIT, A.SELL_NET_PROFIT, A.ACCET_RATE_OF_RETURN, A.FLOW_RATE, A.QUICK_FREEZE_RATE, A.ASSET_LIABILITIES_RATE, A.LEVER_RATE, A.SELL_INCOME_INCREASE, A.ASSET_INCOME_INCREASE, A.YSZKZE_DAYS, A.CHZHZH_DAYS, A.TOTAL_ASSET_DAYS, A.CASH_FLOW_DEBT, A.XJFZZE_RATE, A.SELL_CASH_RATE, A.YYXJHL_RATE, A.EBITDA, A.CREATE_DATE, A.CREATE_ID FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_ANALYZE A WHERE A.CLIENT_ID=#{CLIENT_ID}

SELECT ID , CURRENCY_FUNDS , SHORT_INVESTMENT, ACCOUNTS_BILLS , ACCOUNTS_SECTION , BAD_SECTION , ACCOUNT_NET , PREPAID , OTHER_ACCOUNT, STOCK , STOCK_MATERIAL , STOCK_THEN_PRODUCT , STOCK_HALF_PRODUCT , STOCK_PRODUCT , STOCK_STAGE_COLLECTION , STOCK_PACKAGE , STOCK_CONSUMABLES , WAIT_FEE , FLOW_NET_LOSS , FLOW_ASSETS_TOTAL , LONG_INVESTMENT , FIXED_ASSENT_ORIGINAL , ASSENT_DAMAGED , FIXED_NET , FIXED_CLEAN , PROGRESS_PROJECT , FIXED_NET_LOSS , FIXED_TOTAL , INVISIBLE_NET , DEFERRED_NET , OTHER_LONG_NET , FIXED_INVISIBLE_TOTAL , DEFERRED_TAX , NET_TOTAL , SHORT_LOAN , COPE_BILLS , COPE_SECTION , ADVANCE , COPE_WAGE , COPE_WELFARE , COPE_DIVIDEND , NOT_TEX , OTHER_NOT_SECTION , OTHER_COPE_SECTION , HOLD_SECTION , IN_YEAR_LONG_DABT , FLOW_DABT_TOTAL , LONG_LOAN , COPE_BOND , LONG_COPE_SECTION , OTHER_LONG_DABT , LONG_DABT_TOTAL , DEFERRED_TEX_ITEM , DABT_TOTAL , PAID_CAPITAL , CAPITAL_RESERVE , SURPLUS_RESERVE , CHEST , NOT_PROFIT , OWER_TOTAL , DABT_OWER_TOTAL , SHORT_INVEST , STOCK_DECLINE , LONG_INVEST , FIXED_DECLINE , INVISIBLE_DECLINE , UNDER_PROJECT_DECLINE , CREDIT_DECLINE , BAD_READY , NOTE_TOTAL , ACCOUNTS_DIVIDENT , ACCOUNTS_INTEREST , ACCOUNTS_SUBSIDY_PAY , ONEYEAR_CLAIMS_INVEST , FLOW_OTHER_ASSETS , LONG_OPTION_INVEST , LONG_CLAIMS_INVEST , LONG_INVEST_TOTAL , PROJECT_SUPPLIES , LONG_PREPAID_FEE , FLDZC_A , LDFZ_A , LDFZ_B , LDFZ_C , LDFZ_D , FCQFZ_A , SYZQY_A , SYZQY_B , TRADING_FINANCIAL_ASSETS , IN_DATE , CREDIT_HEAD_ID , PEOPLE_ID , TYPE , CREATE_NAME , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_CODE , CONTRACT_ID , STATEDTAT , FLAG , FIVELEVER_ID , FGI_ID , ASS_ID , SUPPLIERS_CREDIT_HEAD_ID , YEAR_BEGIN_DEFFERENCE, YEAR_END_DEFFERENCE, YEAR_BEGIN_BAD_PROPORTION, YEAR_END_BAD_PROPORTION, YEAR_BEGIN_PROFIT, YEAR_END_SURPLUS, IDENTIFIERS, ISAUDIT FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT DEBT WHERE IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID} AND DEBT.PEOPLE_ID=#{CUST_ID} AND DEBT.HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} ORDER BY DEBT.ID ASC

SELECT UNIT_NAME, CHECK_PEOPLE, to_char(CHECK_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') CHECK_DATE, REVIEW_PEOPLE, to_char(REVIEW_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') REVIEW_DATE, INDEX_CODE, BELONG_DATE FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT WHERE IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID} AND PEOPLE_ID = #{CUST_ID} AND HY_ID = #{INDUSTRY_ID} GROUP BY UNIT_NAME , CHECK_PEOPLE, CHECK_DATE, REVIEW_PEOPLE, REVIEW_DATE, INDEX_CODE, BELONG_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT WHERE TO_NUMBER(PEOPLE_ID)=TO_NUMBER(#{CLIENT_ID})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT WHERE IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID} AND TO_NUMBER(PEOPLE_ID)=TO_NUMBER(#{CLIENT_ID}) AND TO_NUMBER(HY_ID)=TO_NUMBER(#{INDUSTRY_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, UNDIST_PROFIT_DIFF, CREDIT_HEAD_ID, CREADE_CODE, CREADE_DATE , STATE, MAIN_INCOME, MAIN_COST, MAIN_TAXES, MAIN_PROFIT, MAIN_OTHER_PROFIT, MAIN_OPER_COST, MAIN_MAN_FEE, MAIN_FINNA_FEE, OPER_PROFIT, INVESTMENT_PROFIT, SUBSIDY_INCOME, OPER_INCOME, OPER_EXPENDITURE, PROFIT_TOTAL, INCOME_TAX, PROFIT_NET, NOT_ASSIGNED_PROFIT , OTHER_TRANSFER, DISTRIBUTION_PROFIT, STATU_SURPLUS_RESERVE, STATU_SURPLUS_FUND, BONUS_WELFARE_FUND, RESERVE_FUND, DEVELOPMENT_FUND, PROFIT_RETURN_INVESTMENT, INVESTOR_PROFIT, PAININ_DIVIDEND, EXTRACTION_SURPLUS_RESERVE, PAIDIN_ORDINARY_FUND, CAPITAL_FUND, UNDISTR_PROFIT, WELFARE_FUND_RATE INCOME_TAX_RATE , INTEREST_EXPENSES , LONG_TERM_DEBT_BURDEN , CURRENT_DEBT_BURDEN , NET_SALES , REMARK1 , REMARK2 , REMARK3 , REMARK4 , IN_DATE , CONTRACT_ID , STATEDTAT , FLAG , FIVELEVER_ID , FGI_ID , ASS_ID SUPPLIERS_CREDIT_HEAD_ID, SURPLUS_RESERVE_RATE, KGFPLR_A , KGFPLR_B , PEOPLE_ID , TYPE , IDENTIFIERS, ISAUDIT FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS WHERE IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID} AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CUST_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} ORDER BY ID

SELECT UNIT_NAME, CHECK_PEOPLE, TO_CHAR(CHECK_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') CHECK_DATE, REVIEW_PEOPLE, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') REVIEW_DATE, INDEX_CODE, BELONG_DATE FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS WHERE IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID} AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CUST_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} GROUP BY UNIT_NAME, CHECK_PEOPLE, CHECK_DATE, REVIEW_PEOPLE, REVIEW_DATE, INDEX_CODE, BELONG_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS WHERE PEOPLE_ID=#{PEOPLE_ID}

SELECT ID , PROVIDE_SERVICE_CASH , TAX_RETURN , OTHER_OPERATE , OPERATE_INTO_TOTAL , PROVIDE_PAYMENT_CASH , PAYMENT_STAFF_CASH , PAY_ITEM_TAX , PAY_PROVIDE_CASH , OPERATE_OUT_TOTAL , OPERATE_NET , INVEST_CASH , INVEST_INCOME , ASSETS_CASH , OTHER_INVEST , INVEST_INTO , ASSET_PAY , INVEST_PAY , OTHER_INVEST_PAY , INVEST_OUT , INVEST_NET , ABSORB_INVEST , LOAN , OTHER_PREPARE_IN , PREPARE_INCOM_TOTAL , DEBT_PAY , INTEREST_PAY , OTHER_PREPARE_PAY , PREPARE_OUT_TOTAL , PREPARE_NET , CHANGE_RATE , CASH_NET , NET , ASSET_REDUCE , FIXED_DEP , INVISIBLE_DEP , PREPAID_FEE , PREPAID_REDUCE , HOLD_ADD , ASSET_LOSS , FIXED_LOSS , FINANCE_FEE , INVEST_LOSS , DEFERR , STOCK_REDUCE , OPERATE_INCOME , OPERATE_PAY , OTHE , OPERATE_NET_D , DEBT_TO_CAPITAL , YEAR_BOND , FINANCE , END_BALANCE , BEGIN_BALANCE , THING_END_BALANCE , THING_BEGIN_BALANCE , CASH_INCREASE , A_COMPARE_D , B_COMPARE_G , C_COMPARE_PROFIT , E_COMPARE_BEGIN , E_COMPARE_END , F_COMPARE_BEGIN , B_COMPARE_DEFFERENCE , UNKNOWN_ONE , UNKNOWN_TWO , UNKNOWN_THREE , UNKNOWN_FOUR , UNKNOWN_FIVE , UNKNOWN_SIX , UNKNOWN_SEVEN , UNKNOWN_EIGHT , CASH_PAYMENTS , INCOME_TAX , BEGINNING_CASH_EQUIVALENTS , FINAL_CASH_EQUIVALENTS , NMLDFZ , QMLDFZ , CREDIT_HEAD_ID , CREATE_NAME , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_CODE , PEOPLE_ID , TYPE , IN_DATE , CONTRACT_ID , STATEDTAT , FLAG , FIVELEVER_ID , CASH_VALUE , CASH_HOUJIA_VAVLE , FGI_ID , ASS_ID , SUPPLIERS_CREDIT_HEAD_ID , HY_ID , IDENTIFIERS, ISAUDIT FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH WHERE IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID} AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CUST_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} ORDER BY ID

SELECT UNIT_NAME , CHECK_PEOPLE , TO_CHAR(CHECK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_DATE , REVIEW_PEOPLE , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') REVIEW_DATE , INDEX_CODE , BELONG_DATE FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH WHERE IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID} AND PEOPLE_ID=#{CUST_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} GROUP BY UNIT_NAME , CHECK_PEOPLE , CHECK_DATE , REVIEW_PEOPLE , REVIEW_DATE , INDEX_CODE , BELONG_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH WHERE PEOPLE_ID=#{PEOPLE_ID} AND IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID}

SELECT ID , ANALYZE_DATE , SELL_GROSS_PROFIT , SELL_NET_PROFIT , ACCET_RATE_OF_RETURN , FLOW_RATE , QUICK_FREEZE_RATE , ASSET_LIABILITIES_RATE, LEVER_RATE , SELL_INCOME_INCREASE , ASSET_INCOME_INCREASE , YSZKZE_DAYS , CHZHZH_DAYS , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_ID , UPDATE_DATE , UPDATE_ID , TOTAL_ASSET_DAYS , CASH_FLOW_DEBT , XJFZZE_RATE , SELL_CASH_RATE , YYXJHL_RATE , EBITDA FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_ANALYZE WHERE IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID} AND CLIENT_ID=#{CUST_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID}

SELECT UNIT_NAME , CHECK_DATE , CHECK_PEOPLE , REVIEW_PEOPLE , REVIEW_DATE , INDEX_CODE , BELONG_DATE FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_ANALYZE WHERE IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID} AND CLIENT_ID=#{CUST_ID} AND HY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID} GROUP BY UNIT_NAME, CHECK_DATE , CHECK_PEOPLE , REVIEW_PEOPLE , REVIEW_DATE , INDEX_CODE , BELONG_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_ANALYZE WHERE CLIENT_ID=#{PEOPLE_ID} AND IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID}

SELECT ID, PEOPLE_ID, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_TIME, OPERATOR_NAME, OPERATOR_CODE, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE1,'yyyy-MM-dd') IN_DATE1, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE2,'yyyy-MM-dd') IN_DATE2, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE3,'yyyy-MM-dd') IN_DATE3 FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_MANAGE WHERE PEOPLE_ID= #{PEOPLE_ID}

SELECT T.ID, TO_CHAR(T.IN_DATE1, 'yyyy-MM-dd') IN_DATE1, TO_CHAR(T.IN_DATE2, 'yyyy-MM-dd') IN_DATE2, TO_CHAR(T.IN_DATE3, 'yyyy-MM-dd') IN_DATE3, T.OPERATOR_ID, T.OPERATOR_NAME, T.OPERATOR_CODE, T.PEOPLE_ID, T.OPERATOR_TIME FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_MANAGE T WHERE T.ID = #{ID} AND T.PEOPLE_ID=#{PEOPLE_ID} AND T.INDUSTRY_ID=#{INDUSTRY_ID}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT T WHERE T.IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH T WHERE T.IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS T WHERE T.IDENTIFIERS=#{MANAGEID}
mapper.update: UPDATE FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT TT SET TT.IN_DATE = #{IN_DATE} WHERE TT.ID = ( SELECT ID FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.ID, ROWNUM AS NO FROM (SELECT * FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_DEBT WHERE IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID} ORDER BY ID ASC) T) WHERE NO = #{ROWNUM}) )

UPDATE FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH TT SET TT.IN_DATE = #{IN_DATE} WHERE TT.ID = ( SELECT ID FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.ID, ROWNUM AS NO FROM (SELECT * FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_CASH WHERE IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID} ORDER BY ID ASC) T) WHERE NO = #{ROWNUM}) )

UPDATE FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS TT SET TT.IN_DATE = #{IN_DATE} WHERE TT.ID = ( SELECT ID FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.ID, ROWNUM AS NO FROM (SELECT * FROM FIL_CREDIT_FINANCE_PROFITDIS WHERE IDENTIFIERS = #{MANAGEID} ORDER BY ID ASC) T) WHERE NO = #{ROWNUM}) )
